nodes.text: The B2 battle droid dispenser was a large, roughly cylindrical container made of durasteel that resembled a taller version of the B1 battle droid dispenser.

Like its smaller cousin, the dispenser was used by the Confederacy of Independent Systems to continually deploy B2 super battle droids through four large hatches. Though not as common as their smaller, presumably cheaper counterparts, many of them were encountered by the clone commandos of Delta Squad during the Clone Wars. The dispensers had their own means of propulsion, and were used as boarding craft by the CIS in their attempt to steal the Prosecutor.
Demolition charges took longer to attach on them than their B1 counterparts.
Like the B1 battle droid dispenser, it is unclear whether the units actually had the capacity to produce an unlimited number of droids.
